bureau_office.title: Detective Bureau
bureau_office.description: Your safe house and office. Review the case file here.

hauptbahnhof.title: Hauptbahnhof
hauptbahnhof.description: Central Station. Entry point to Freiburg (1905).

munsterplatz_bank.title: Bankhaus J.A. Krebs
munsterplatz_bank.description: Münsterplatz 4. Bank under reconstruction — scene of the heist.

ganter_brauerei.title: Ganter Brauerei
ganter_brauerei.description: Where workers talk. Rumors, leaflets, and blueprints change hands.

rathaus_archiv.title: Rathaus / Archives
rathaus_archiv.description: Old maps, permits, sewer plans. Bureaucracy with a long memory.

basler_hof.title: Basler Hof
basler_hof.description: Polizeidirektion. Paperwork, pressure, and sealed files.

stuhlinger_warehouse.title: Stühlinger Warehouse
stuhlinger_warehouse.description: A quiet depot behind the station. Good place to hide something loud and heavy.

lime_footprints.label: Lime footprints on soles
lime_footprints.description: White dust (construction lime) on boards and by the window. Someone walked from the construction site inside — after closing.

empty_schnapps_bottle.label: Empty schnapps bottle
empty_schnapps_bottle.description: At the guard post. The guard was clearly drinking on duty: dulled reaction, and the dog could react to the smell of alcohol.

director_letter.label: Letter about Creditbank merger
director_letter.description: The director is preparing to transfer assets. Today the vault held cash and documents — too tempting a target.

meckel_blueprint.label: Meckel's blueprint: "thin wall"
meckel_blueprint.description: The plan marks a section of the basement bordering an old drain. The perfect path for quiet entry and exit.

friedeberg_poster.label: Rally poster (Friedeberg)
friedeberg_poster.description: A workers' meeting is expected in the evening. If someone wanted to distract the police, this is convenient background noise and a reason to redistribute patrols.
